So, Mr. Pelf is going some work the next days to adapt this to 0.16.

So, Mr. Pelf is going some work the next days to adapt this to 0.16.

I won\'t have all the modules updated with the sexy new panels because I want to get functioning airlocks out. But hopefully I\'ll have an update out in the next couple of days.
inflatable crew quorters. ways almost nothing but is highly expencive and fragle. it culd be deployed from something as small as an rcs tank to be 2X the size of your largeist modual.

Hum... in fact, they\'re quite resistant. As much as concrete. Take a look here, is very nice and worth a check:

Looks like its time to update to .16!
only problem with the UUI node is it needs reasizing to fit the new 2.5 size lol unles youa re up scaling yourstuff as well.

If anyone knows how to make functional airlocks let me know.

And nozzle heat effects.

Question1.

Short answer is: you can\'t make airlocks without the either devhax or the new yet to be released parttools.

Long answer:

1. Create a box around your airlock in your modelling software

2. Load your stuff into unity

3. Add a unity tag named 'Airlock' and a layer named 'Part Triggers'

4. Assign the tag to your airlock and move it to the Part Triggers layer you just created

5. Use the new yet to be released parttools or devhax to export your part.

I\'ll try to make a tutorial video on this stuff unless a dev makes one first as soon as the new partools drop.

Question2.

Like this: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13450.0
Thanks a bunch.
Can\'t Wait For The Update Hope it comes soon!
I\'ll try to have an update out by the middle of the week. The parts won\'t be made to be functional until the devs release the new part tools for 0.16.
All modelling is done. I just need to set up the new part tools (which I don\'t know how to do) and make everything functional.

Looking forward to it Pelf. Was waiting for you to update to .16 to try this out. 8)

Thanks for all of your hard work.
Don\'t get too excited just yet. I have no idea what to do with the part tools or anything. If anyone knows of any tutorials, let me know.
You\'ll have to wait for the 0.16 part tools, first.
They are out.
So How Is The Update Coming?
I have no idea how to use the part tools so I think I'll package everything up and release that for now. It will just be a visual overhaul of a bunch of parts; no functionality.
New update released. No functionality has been added. See OP for link and changelog. Be sure to delete your old parts. Report any bugs.

Why such a low ISP on the SM engine?

Why such a low ISP on the SM engine?

Thanks for pointing that out. I must have dropped both values by 100. I'll fix it. Such a small tweak isn't worth a reupload so for now just edit the .cfg yourself.

Edit:

I also noticed that the mass of the SA airlock part was way too much so I fixed it.
